verbs.description: [ARGM-DIS: romeo] langford [V: shines] in debut scores 19 in hoosier romp hoosiers fans got to their seats inside simon skjodt assembly hall a little bit earlier than usual on tuesday night the student section nearly full almost an hour before tip - off the state of indiana reigning mr basketball award winner was about to jog out of the indiana university locker room in the school famed candy - stripe warmup pants this was a moment more than two years in the making emotions were high langford said with a grin i could n't wait hoosiers romeo langford indiana university langford archie miller bloomington indiana chicago state romeo
